bike.description: M5 manipulated alloy w/ ORE TT/DT, EVO geometry, tapered HT, ISCG 05, link extension for shock, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Fox RP23-S with Boost Valve, reb and separate climbing setting and custom 3-position low-speed comp adj., 7.75x2.0"
1-1/8 and 1.5" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1.5" lower, cartridge bearings
Specialized Command Post, 3 position, 125mm adjustable height w/air spring, remote operated, single bolt head
34.9mm clamp ID, 7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, black
